attributes.action: Let life go back to normal and let people live!
attributes.additional_details:
When do we decide quality of life outweighs the risks?
I understand Covid can be deadly for SOME people, but so are strawberries or shellfish.
We take risks multiple times a day without a second thought. The dangers of smoking, drinking we do it anyway. Maybe a waiver somewhere We can sign that says, "I understand the risks, but I choose a life with Hugs and Smiles. I understand the possibility I could die, but most likely end up feeling like crap for a few days. We either get busy living or we get busy dying. When Life decides it's your time, that’s it, so I guess I would rather spend my time enjoying it and living it not worrying about what ifs and maybes.
attributes.background: Stop all the lockdowns and restrictions.
